mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.password, m.email, m.address, m.inserted, m.nickName, count(b.id) numberOfBoard FROM Member m left JOIN Board b ON m.id=b.writer GROUP BY m.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (id, password, email, address, nickName) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET password=#{password}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, nickname=#{nickname} WHERE id = #{id}
